website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice if you want an effective shower filter in an alternative design. However, it costs significantly more than other models.
pros: Once installed, filter cartridges are easy to replace
cons: Expensive and a bit difficult to install

customer_reviews.title: Did not remove chlorine as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This shower filter failed to do as advertised. It did not remove the chlorine. My chlorine levels were almost exaxtley the same with and without the filter. I'm so upset that they falsely advertised. I encourage anyone who buys this product to do their own chlorine tests to see how well it's working. And be sure to test it in hot water like you would shower in.
customer_reviews.author: A. wiuff

customer_reviews.title: SKIP IT
customer_reviews.text: We used hard water strips on sink water and then the water from the filter. It’s the same- No difference. We will be returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle K.

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: This is a sham, a total piece of junk knock-off. I strongly believe the positive reviews are either clueless people that don't actually pay attention or they are all paid/compensated reviewers not being honest. I am going back to my culligan showerhead and filters because they actually work. I had tried this thinking I might get even better filtration or a longer life but I regret the experiment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The left test strip is regular tap water, the ...
customer_reviews.text: The left test strip is regular tap water, the right is from the aquasana shower head. I used test strips after letting the shower head run for a few days. No difference, my eyes are still burning from the chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: SHAUNNA ALLEN

customer_reviews.title: Does not filter any 'chlorine' at all, water company measured before and after.
customer_reviews.text: I can verify that this does NOT block any chlorine at all. My water company measured the levels in my water before and after, and the levels are virtually identical. The levels are still very bad and the smell is overwhelming......this filter did nothing, absolutely nothing. I gave this two stars instead of one because I did not verify the before or after of anything else it is reported to filter. All that being said, does anyone know of a filter that actually does filter out chlorine?
customer_reviews.author: Scooby

customer_reviews.title: Emits brown water
customer_reviews.text: I installed the AQ-4100 Delux Shower head About 4 months ago. There is no significant reduction in pressure and it seems to be effective regarding reduction of chlorine. The reason I am giving one star is that when initially turning it on the water comes out brown every time , this doesn’t happen with the tub spout or any other area in the home. It is definitely some type of reaction or ferrous metal inside the filter or housing itself. I noticed that someone in the Aquasana website has the exact same complaint. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: RichP

customer_reviews.title: below competitors
customer_reviews.text: I am currently testing different brands for my home, this looked promising as far as is the biggest in size (bulkiest) but once installed it didn't work, actually chlorine increased with it. . so instead of filtering .. worsened the water quality. I ended using Chinese Filters that work Better!! . . sad ..
customer_reviews.author: C Valero

customer_reviews.title: SNAKE OIL GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: Live in an area with VERY HARD WATER and this thing is a joke. Looking at the companies responses, saying that the dissolved PPM wont change, as the put in two compounds for every one they remove. Super leaky but was able to get it to a very minimal drip by using extra Teflon tape and over-tightening. wanted it to work, but my itchy skin remains after 2 weeks. Companies like this should be sued and their owners put in jail.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Good product but with some installation problems
customer_reviews.text: The filter itself is good. The quality of water has definitely improved. I would be able to give a better testimonial of the quality of water after a few weeks of usage. But there is a leakage from the top of the cartridge as seen in the photo. I tried removing the cartridge and fix it again tightly, but it still keeps leaking a lot of water. Please help me fix this leak
customer_reviews.author: Apurv

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about this product. I live in an area where the water is super hard for our skin and hair. We installed, I don't see ANY differents on my hair or skin AND the shower doesn't work as they described not a good product at all. I have to look for another one that really works. Also, water doesn't flow at all as shower it should be no water pressure, and the water holes are clot al the time! I am very disappointed, what a waste of money! ("Maximum Filtration & Water Pressure - Constructed with a unique up-flow design which prevents clogging, increases contact time with media, and maintains water pressure")
customer_reviews.author: Gisellasosa

customer_reviews.title: Great for hair and skin
customer_reviews.text: This is the second filter of this brand we have used and we highly recommend it . Our first filter was used in our home in the high Mojave desert which was necessary for the hard water coming from the underground acquirers . We moved cross Country several months ago to Charleston where I discovered the water was not much better than our desert water , which made it necessary to order another filter for the shower. My hair and skin benefit from this filtration shower head .
customer_reviews.author: keljan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with a softener. I have no idea what took me so long to recognize that I needed a water softener. If you experience extreme dry skin after a shower or bath like I do, even after using the best of best body washes, chances are you need a water softener. From the very first shower, I noticed a difference. I didnt even have to put lotion on, and my skin is so soft. Definitely worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: YeloGrl

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work but cuts down pressure
customer_reviews.text: I would like it a lot more if the water pressure didn't fall off as much as it did. I took a drill to it and enlarged the hole so more water pressure might come through but it only partly worked. A better option would be to install a whole house carbon filter. In my last home I had 2 pressure tanks, one to force water through all the filtration filters, greensand filter and water softener and another to push good pressure through the house to all the showers and sinks.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Nelkin

customer_reviews.title: Added sanitary filter for my shower
customer_reviews.text: This is the third water filter I've purchased for my shower. I change the head every 6 months. The showerhead is an additional sanitary/safety feature to filter out toxins and chemicals in the local water. I will buy more in another 6 months. The cost is very reasonable for the benefits gained.
customer_reviews.author: CZM

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my skin!!
customer_reviews.text: I was having an issue with my skin completely flaking and I realized that it started ever since I had moved to a new apartment a few months ago. My sister suggested I get a shower filter so I searched and ordered this one. It was easy to install -with the help of my super, and I saw the difference immediately!! The issue with my skin that had been plaguing me just completely disappeared!! I'm so thankful.
customer_reviews.author: vkvint

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, DO NOT buy..
customer_reviews.text: Tried this product, used consistently for 6 months.. no change in hair fall for hair quality. This product does not work as specified.. my suggestion is to keep away and save your money. Try other methods to stop hairfall..
customer_reviews.author: Adarsh Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t see a significant difference
customer_reviews.text: Pressure is good and the shower head was easy to install. There was definitely a difference in the water when our city switched to chlorine for a month while they didn’t maintenance on the system. We didn’t smell the chlorine when showering. Our skin was still dry and our hair felt like you had hair product in it. Maybe the 3 weeks that it ran with the chlorine water was all it could handle or our water here is just really bad but I don’t see much of a difference in the water from the sink versus the shower anymore. We don’t overuse the shower so even if it should last about 6 months we’re not close.
customer_reviews.author: CFGirl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and a must have for my shower
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the aqua Dana shower filters for several years, this particular purchase was a recent replacement so I thought I would write a quick review. Using this filter has helped my hair immensely, before using the filter the water would bleach my hair making it dry and lighter in color, this is due to the chlorine chemicals used to clean or treat the water. After using this filter my hair has improved drastically in texture and color. I don't know if it has helped my skin, I can only imagine that it is just by the changes it had on my hair. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great filter, but filter replacements...
customer_reviews.text: I like this filter a lot, but wish the replacements were more sustainable by allowing reuse of the outer shell. Perhaps this could also reduce the cost (Currently paying $48 - 52 per filter). I'm not big on the plastic design, but it seems to do the job. I haven't tested water before/and after for chlorine or other metals/chemicals, but the water does appear slightly cleaner in color and smell.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Polzin

customer_reviews.title: Clean water
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver. I live in a area with horrible water. The water is very brown at times ans smells like metal. It will make you gag if try and brush your teeth with it. Just a side note the town of course says there is nothing wrong. I got this so I could at least shower and it worked perfect. Clear water no smell. Easy to install ,just screw it on. Since then I installed a whole home filtration and softener. This little filter actually convinced me to do so it worked so well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer's

customer_reviews.title: Excellent water filtration
customer_reviews.text: I've used this shower filter from Aquasana for years and have them on auto delivery. It really makes a difference in the overall softness, manageability and shine of my medium thick Asian hair. I wish the filters would come separate without the head though. My shower has a low pressure problem and I end up using just the filter each time and discarding the shower head.
customer_reviews.author: shanghaishaman

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: I can tell when I need to change it, due to drying of skin. when I take my shower the water has no smell, like it should be and my skin feels vey nice. when I run my bath water I can smell the chloride and god only knows what else and my skin gets extremely dry I recommend this above many others. it excellent quality also. most importantly it works as they say.
customer_reviews.author: George C. Baker

customer_reviews.title: I dont think this product is doing anything. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I dont think this product is doing anything. I read a lot of reviews, was not sure about it and I still bought it. For sure ... does not do anything for you, just another piece of plastic placed on your shower
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Narrow streams in lessthan 3 months and Cheap parts and over rated
customer_reviews.text: I purchased showehead and filter during last week of may 2019. In less than 3 months water stream slowed down and when i contacted customer service they asked me to pay $5 to send replacement part. They suggested to soak the showerhead in vinegar and water which never worked. I previously used Jonathan showerhead filter which didn't give me a problem for an year. Aquasana showerhead is expensive and the quality is cheap. I would avoid purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: This. Filter. Is. THE. truth.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't reduce the flow, I have noticed a marked difference in how my shower water And my skin feel....this is the second shower filter that I tried and I am so happy that I bought this one that I just had to come back and rant and rave about it. If you have hard water and you're on the fence about buying this product, get off the fence already and press that button!
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Makes a huge mess, doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 0 stars I would. Ordered it and it sprayed EVERYWHERE out of the pipe. Thought I had a defective one, ordered a new one. Same thing.! Called customer service and they let me know a rubber washer had to pushed securely into the metal collar of the shower head. Did that... still sprayed. We locked this washer in, literally hammered it into place. SUCH A WASTE OF MONEY and so frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Skye

customer_reviews.title: Very easy installation, just follow the manual
customer_reviews.text: After 2 weeks of usage I can conclude that the water definitely feels better and smells better. However, pH didn't change that much (neutral pH in NYC is generally expected) and my s/o's dandruff/dry scalp issue is still ongoing. It did help it a little though... I guess over time the effects would be much more noticable.
customer_reviews.author: Karlito

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product a few years ago and liked it. However I'm extremely disappointed with my recent purchase. The joint that connects the filter is extremely loose and there is no way of tightening it and as shown in the video, besides causing waste, water gets ALL over the place. I even tried using Teflon tape to seal it and that did not help. I'm unable to even return it at this time due to constraints and am extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I just moved to San Antonio tx, my skin has been breaking out and my hair hasn’t been the same softness as it was before. I decided on this water filter after doing some research and reading reviews. I have only used it twice now but can tell a huge difference already, hair is soft again and can tell a change in my skin clearing up. So far I’m impressed and glad I made the purchase. Easy to install too. Hoping the filter lasts as long as it promises.
customer_reviews.author: Stephenie M.

customer_reviews.title: Not effective for Hair Loss
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for few months now and did not feel any softness in the water - subsequently did not have any good effects on the hair quality. I thought it would work to at least some degree given that its pricier than most other filters, but was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mads M

customer_reviews.title: No more psoriasis!
customer_reviews.text: This filter effectively filters out chlorine. So I do not have to suffer from psoriasis anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Norman

customer_reviews.title: WOW - Great product !! Clean shower water Finally !!
customer_reviews.text: If you are sick and tired of clorine smell in your shower than this is the product that can clean up the water for your shower. So easy to install too. It took me all of 2 minutes to unscrew the old shower head and screw this shower head/filter on. It is that easy and replacement every 6 months is great too. Buy this and get clean water in your shower.
customer_reviews.author: BeachGuy

customer_reviews.title: Love My New Hair!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have read a lot of reviews on this and many people seemed to have issues installing this shower filter. It took me less than 5 minutes to install mine and there was no leakage at all. I absolutely love the shower head. It is wide enough for my liking and the water pressure is perfect as well. I bought this filter mainly to improve the health and appearance of my hair and it does exactly that. My hair is softer, shinier, and less frizzy and dry. If you want healthier hair and skin I would definitely recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Been great for 8... years that is
customer_reviews.text: I found out about this filter in about 2010 and rarely deal without it. I went 3 months over without replacing it and bot could I tell. my hair 4a 3c felt so dry after shampooing. it was very stringy and weak feeling. now it's back to top notch I had major seborrheic dermatitis and when I was in Houston the water TRASHED my skin and hair. So I searched and found this. now that I'm in NC the water is much better but chlorine is no joke. this helps so much
customer_reviews.author: Laquita

customer_reviews.title: Works, but defective.
customer_reviews.text: The unit I bought doesn't just leak, it sprays all over; not from the pipe connection, which was fine, but from the area where the metal connector meets the filter. I had to hold the filter with one hand, while showering, in such a way that it reduced spraying/leaking. Not a practical way to shower. I will be returning it. That said, I did notice an immediate difference in the water quality. We have heavy iron and sulphur in the water, and few if any filters work with iron. If the company offers a replacement, I will try it again.
customer_reviews.author: CallieNH1

customer_reviews.title: We gave this filter a go 2 different times for ...
customer_reviews.text: We gave this filter a go 2 different times for 6 month in each location. Did not notice even a slight difference at all. Water is still hard as a rock and leaves the skin and hair dry, calcium deposit is still all over the tub. Definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Memory Flash

customer_reviews.title: Serves a purpose
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. It worked. I could not install this myself. Had a really tough time taking off the originall shower head and then trying to install this head was not working. I ended up having to hire a handyman. You will need to replace the filter every six months at least.
customer_reviews.author: Little Filly

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love these water filters and have two of them now. Gives me peace of mind that we are getting better water with chlorine filtered out. Also my hair and skin feel sooooo much better. Highly Highly recommend. We have a regular shower head and the one with the hose for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Not a good solution for extreme hard water
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved to a house that has extremely hard well water. Everything has a white film, powder or fine white crystals after washing or rinsing. My hair is always disgusting -- oily, sticky and dry and frizzy all at the same time. I installed the Aquasana and it worked great -- for TWO WEEKS. Now my hair is back to disgusting. The filter gets dirty too quickly. Time to find a much larger system for the entire house. I'm not sure how many stars to give it because it worked great for two weeks but doesn't last. Perhaps if you have other issues like chlorine etc, it would work better.
customer_reviews.author: mpkinDC

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product I've ever bought on Amazon! The shower head does not fit onto the main filter. I tightened it as much as possible but it wasn't enough and black water sprayed everywhere in my bathroom. You should NOT BUY THIS POS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted for 5 weeks then unusable do to poor water pressure. hi
customer_reviews.text: My water pressure dropped dramatically just after 6 weeks of use to the point where I switched back to my original shower head. Not sure why this happened but it did not last and I feel ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shower filter!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my brother because his hair started to thin and got very dry. I use the pelican shower filter but the design of the pelican filter wouldn't fit his shower height so I went with this aquasana filter because the design works with his shower. He thanks me everyday that I made this purchase for him. His hair is fuller and much softer. He just recently took a trip to Europe and complained about how their water dried out his hair and he can't wait to get back home to his shower filter lol!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: it made my hair worse.
customer_reviews.text: I think it is fake because it doesn’t work at all. It made my hair way worse, more dry and sticky. I ordered aqua bliss. This trash is going to the return bin!
customer_reviews.author: Eli G.

customer_reviews.title: Aquasana Filters are the BEST!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the same unit as the Johnathon Brand. Shower filters are cheaper on amazon then on the other sites including the manufacturer site, aquasana. My wife like's how her hair feels after using this product. Soft and manageable, combs right through it.
customer_reviews.author: D. RZONCA

customer_reviews.title: Leaked everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it because it was leaking everywhere. Followed included instructions and suggestions in the comments but nothing worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Aquasna
customer_reviews.text: We have a salt water softener for the entire house. We also have a reverse osmosis and alkaline filter underneath the kitchen sink. This filter had such great reviews, and I agree with them all. It's nice to know that the chlorine can be filtered out without buying a $3,000 whole house system. I don't even care that it's ugly. We are going to spray paint it the bronze color of our show fixtures. Or not. It's kind of cute all plain and efficient!
customer_reviews.author: Girlease Bra Liner

customer_reviews.title: A must if you don't have a water softener
customer_reviews.text: Filtered my horrible central TX water and saved my hair. Wish I had gotten an Aquasana sooner since my landlord at the time did not have a water softener. If you're renting in a similar situation just stock up on these, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Low flow that gets worse quickly
customer_reviews.text: This shower head and filter had adequate flow to begin with, but it slowed to a trickle after only 60 days. While it worked, it seemed to do a nice job, but I didn't test the water qualitatively so who knows. I contacted the manufacturer directly because they advertise a 90 day 'pure satisfaction' guarantee. They were a little rude and stated that they would absolutely not honor it and actually hung up the phone. I persisted and they eventually gave me a code. Watch out for shady practices here, if you're not persistent they will try to dodge the return of a defective unit.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: This shower filter is a essential part of your home if you have hard water and on a budget. I was a little skeptical about it’s performance I purchased it in May and this is August you can see and feel the difference in your shower water within a few months. Your skin feels softer your shower doesn’t have all that scaling from the hard water. This is a outstanding product my family and I highly recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: milton alcorn

customer_reviews.title: This filter is life changing! Not even kidding.
customer_reviews.text: My apartment has the worst water ever. My hair and my daughter's hair have basically looked like haystacks for years. I bought this filter praying it would make a difference and boy did it! My hair was unbelievably soft after my very first shower!!! I honestly cannot believe the difference after just one wash! And let me just say, the installation was a piece of cake. Took approximately 1 minute to unscrew the old shower head and screw this one on. I can't believe I didn't know about this year's ago. If you have dry, dull or frizzy hair or hair that just seems coarse and unhealthy even after deep conditioning treatments - try this!!!
customer_reviews.author: MellyS

customer_reviews.title: Was using this filter for almost 9months using the showerhead ...
customer_reviews.text: Was using this filter for almost 9months using the showerhead that can detach and the plastic piece broke.... No point in even reordering another filter. For the price I paid, it should have been a metal showerhead. Cheaapppp
customer_reviews.author: ashley cheri meyers

customer_reviews.title: Last time purchasing as new product leaks badly
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what product manufacturing changes occured, but...bought these filters for many years now and past 2 purchases leak horribly! Lots of water wasted. Tried plumbers tape but realized the leak was not at that connection, rather where the filter screws on and the adjustment knob too. This may be the end of us using this filter, I mean we paid a plumber, ordered a new system, tried a brand new filter. Plus is that there is no more chlorine smell when you shower. Makes your hair come out softer and fewer tangles, too, at least with the water in Washington and Oregon. We loved this system.
customer_reviews.author: Cleanlife

customer_reviews.title: The shower head/filter leaks
customer_reviews.text: I like the filter but the seal between the shower head and the filter leaks. Water drips at the bottom as well as where the shower head and filter join. My handyman tried to fix it and that helped, but there is still a leak.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT, QUALITY, VERY EASY TO INSTALL, WORKS VERY WELL!  PRICE IS RIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: HAPPY WITH THIS FILTER. GLAD TO KNOW THAT MY SHOWER WATER IS CLEANER, SOFTER, AND SAFER TO USE. FAIR PRICE FOR QUALITY FILTER.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Harris

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good, Feels Good, Results Good
customer_reviews.text: A genuine surprise at a decent price. We love our new point-of-use shower filter. Never thought of it before. All good!
customer_reviews.author: Pelican Pointe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shower head
customer_reviews.text: Early on this review but because this is such an excellent product, I had to. Skin feels great, whole family loves this product, Highly recommend and has fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: ksd

customer_reviews.title: Treat them as disposable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of the 4100 filters and just tried to replace the filters. One filter wouldn't line up on the threads no matter what I tried (and I'm very handy), the other leaked at the seal. Both were almost impossible to remove and reinstall, I even had to use a web wrench on one.. The filters themselves work nicely (although a bit on the large size) but the replacement filters should not be considered replaceable. If you go with these, you should plan on paying the extra $5 or so every time you need to replace the filters and replace the entire unit.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of 2015
customer_reviews.text: This product was an easy install and has made a dramatic difference in my hair and skin softness. I originally ordered this product because I suspected that the "hard water" in my apartment complex was causing me to have a skin reaction. This was the case, and my skin inflammation was reduced dramatically. I would recommend this product to anyone with dry brittle hair or skin issues of any kind. There is no leaking, and the water pressure is excellent. I would have never guessed that quality of water that you wash your body with could make such a noticeable difference in the way you feel overall.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance Sims

customer_reviews.title: Leaks like crazy
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this. I’ve ordered 3 of these and all of them have sprayed water from the top and leak like crazy.... if you’re wondering, yes, I did use Teflon tape. Though, nothing has worked. Big mess not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina P

customer_reviews.title: I would consider this a pretty good filter choice for people live in aoartments and ...
customer_reviews.text: I would consider this a pretty good filter choice for people live in aoartments and dorms. It's afordable, easy to install, and it works~! However, don't count on it if you want to filter out hard minerals in tour shower water...the water comes out is still pretty hard and will hurt your skin and hair....but at least the chlorine is gone~ PS: you really can't attach it to any other shower head than the default one...if you have a large shower head and want to keep using it, I suggest buying a extension pipe.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hair and skin soft and healthy.
customer_reviews.text: My hair and skin is so much softer and healthier since I started using this filter. The difference is very apparent.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen W.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few days ago and installed the day I received it. It was as simple as changing a shower head but with 1 extra step. Very easy. I used plumber tape to stop leaks in the pipe-filter connection. I also used my own existing shower hose/head and did not need plumber tape for that connection. It seems to work fine. No problems. I look forward to seeing my hair less dry from all the chemical crap in the Las Vegas water. If I feel a difference in the next few weeks I will install another unit on my second bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: JGB

customer_reviews.title: Best one so far.
customer_reviews.text: I tried the sprite and others, which all read the same as my tap water...which read well anyways because we have a smaller filter that runs through the whole house, but my skin is super sensitive and I noticed my hair falling out since I move across the country. I hooked this up and I couldn't believe how my water readings came out! My skin fells great and my hair is thick again! I always had trouble because I use shampoo and conditioner that has 0 toxicity ratings...normal water caused it to make my hair greasy, this gets it all out and leaves me with soft flowing hair again.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Bes thing ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower filter. I could feel the difference right away. Ever since using it, my skin is much softer, and I enjoy showers more. Highly, highly recommended. I wish I could give it more stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob E

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable shower water filter. Our first one lasted many years and worked great. We just ordered another. Easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: Manya J.

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: easy to install, works wonderfully!! great for skin and hair health. really glad i purchased this, the water quality at my complex is terrible and this has made a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Haley B.

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: to be truthful i haven't had to used it. i moved . the water is better. but i've uesd it before and like it .
customer_reviews.author: anthony resha

customer_reviews.title: Best filter ever
customer_reviews.text: Great filter. I am amazed with the customer service. Its easy to install. Water quality improved. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: MIHIR Y SHAH

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Removes most pollutants,water feels softer. Prior to installation,I would itch uncontrollably after showering! Problem solved
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Lewis-elHafre

customer_reviews.title: Scrubby dub
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my house in the woods that has a septic. I love it and re bought 4 my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Mariadi

customer_reviews.title: I felt a difference immediately
customer_reviews.text: The installation was A breeze. I did that in less than a minute. Unscrewed the old head by hand and screwed the filter on instantly. If I can do it, anyone can! I did forget the bucket to catch the disclosed initial spray, but oh we'll, it washed off when the water turned clear. But the water felt noticeably softer and tasted so much less chloriney! I think I used up the 10,000 gallons in that first shower! I didn't want to get out. Why didn't I find this sooner? It was like indulging my skin in a spa, I felt so healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Caro

customer_reviews.title: Water leaking everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Water is spraying out everywhere, all over the bathroom. I tried to add Teflon tape but the water is leaking from the shower head so it didn’t fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca D Lee

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a glove! I read all the reviews and I was worried. I am absolutely no handyman whatsoever. I put it on in 15 minutes (followed the 3 step directions), and it was a miracle! Required no taping or anything. No leaks! Tight, great pressure/spray, and my body & hair felt great afterwards! I would highly recommend! I have no clue why the other reviews made it so complicated.
customer_reviews.author: A. Moon

customer_reviews.title: It really worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: Best one thing I ever bought. It saved my dying hair, for sure. We’d moved to a place with well water. Very hard.
customer_reviews.author: B. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Try a different model
customer_reviews.text: Works for about three to four weeks and then it’s all clogged up again. Bigger pain than it’s worth.
customer_reviews.author: Della

customer_reviews.title: Silk hair back!
customer_reviews.text: So I'm not testing before and after chlorine levels, all I know after the easy installation that I did by myself, my waist length hair has finally become the silly tresses I had before I moved to this apartment a year ago! Just one use! I thought my hair dresser was using a higher volume of color causing my over dried hair, who knew it was the quality of water being used!
customer_reviews.author: valerie finley

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My hair and skin have noticeably improved since I replaced my old shower head with this one! My hair was dry and my ends split quickly in between trims because of our water quality. I had my hair cut two days before we installed this, and at my next visit six weeks later my hair dresser even saw the difference
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loving this!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I bought this, I feel confident in the filtering, my shower water no longer has a slight metallic odor. The showered is fabulous, installation was quick and easy, I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne W.

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE GETTING CHORINE GASSED WHEN I TAKE A HOT SHOWER!
customer_reviews.text: Love the new water feel. I am not getting poisoned anymore! Especially with hotter showers, I am not getting chlorine gassed in my shower like before. PROTECT YOU AND YOUR LOVED ONES WHO SHOWER IN YOUR HOME! This product does not filter chloramine, but there are other filters for that if you need to filter it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: I'm in shower heaven!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I have ever made. Los Angeles water never felt so clean, soft and pure, as it has since I started showering with this puppy. You feel a difference right away. Skin is not as dry, water is suddenly odorless and just softer and easier on skin and hair... I don't know why I waited so long, honestly. No clue. Installation was super easy... I love this product so far, and I doubt I'll ever want to do without it again.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: it makes a difference
customer_reviews.text: the water in my apartment is very hard and high in chlorine so i definitely needed a filter and this did the job for me the only thing i would say is they should put a valve to switch between filter on and off so if the filtered water is not necessary for some tasks like cleaning the tub you can switch between filtered and unfiltered water with out removing the whole filter system. also the set up is very easy and all you need is a ranch and teflone tape to reseal the shower head to prevent a leak.
customer_reviews.author: honest shopper

customer_reviews.title: High quality, extremely high price
customer_reviews.text: Removes this nasty odor from my heavily polluted city water. Eliminated the dry skin I had. Con: Filter replacement cost just as much as buying a whole new unit. Whole house filters cost just as much at the local walmart as one of these. The replacement filters for the whole house filters at walmart are $3/ea. Can filter my whole house in the long run cheaper than filtering just my shower with this filter.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend buying the kit as opposed to buying the filter ...
customer_reviews.text: changed my hair from brittle to soft in 2 showers!!! Would recommend buying the kit as opposed to buying the filter by itself because it is cheaper. Would reccomend buying Malibue shampo upon your first couple showers to remove the deposits your shower coated your hair with.
customer_reviews.author: K. C.

customer_reviews.title: No problems with mine, fast delivery and water feels nice...
customer_reviews.text: My shower filter arrived in the original packaging, installed in less than 10 minutes and works just fine. The water feels softer, and my wife thinks it has improved the condition of our hair and skin (men, you know we can't tell the freaking difference!). I was concerned with water temperature, since I read somewhere else that the maximum temperature allowed would be the low 90s - not hot enough. But after contacting Aquasana I was informed that the maximum temperature is 125F (more than enough); and the filter does come with a sticker stating an average of 115F. We think it works so well that we are ordering a second one for the second bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: C.E. Lopes

customer_reviews.title: I like it, works well I can see the difference ...
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I gave it 4 stars because it drips...It really doesn't matter since I'm in the shower but getting it to sink perfectly without any water dripping does not work. Aside of this, I like it, works well I can see the difference and I've tried other water softeners so far this is one of the best for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Makes a noticeable difference!
customer_reviews.text: This shower filter does for your shower water what pitcher water filters do to your drinking water: Purifies it, removes any funky smells or tastes, and softens it a little. This means your soap lathers better and your skin gets rinsed cleaner, which you can feel in the way the water runs off you. It's also nice to know that if you ever let the shower water rinse out your mouth, it'll taste better and be healthier!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Our campus has old lead pipes and we are constantly getting notices about lead in the water and this solved our problems. it was pretty easy to install dose not take up to mush space. The water here has been making us itch and this filter really seems to have fixed the problem. You can also put your own shower head on if it is a universal fit.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: It didn't help much!
customer_reviews.text: I used it for a while but felt it didn't help,so I replaced it by a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: elshmm

customer_reviews.title: I was as little disappointed Amazon hadn't cleaned it up more
customer_reviews.text: I bought this used from Amazon. I was as little disappointed Amazon hadn't cleaned it up more, but it still works as the other one I bought new did. Helps with hard water and sulfur issues.
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: This water filter is a little gem - stylish, good size, and it works great. The entire family got the opportunity to try it, and every single one of us loved it and had no complaints. The hair and skin feel so much softer afterwards. It probably took 5 minutes to install, and the replacement filter is easy to find on Amazon at a convenient price. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: I feel the shower filter is a excellent product and have actually been buying this product for ...
customer_reviews.text: There is never any chlorine odor in the shower water at all. I feel the shower filter is a excellent product and have actually been buying this product for years. I've not had any luck with a filter replacement, but a new product is always welcomed when the one stops working.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie A. Sajner

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower - but How Long?
customer_reviews.text: This Filtered Shower water is just what I was expecting regarding the quality of the shower water - Great Shower. I am looking forward to discovering how long the filter actually last. I could not find "E-Water" Filters in stock and they are good for 18 months. This one says it is good for 6 months. Waiting to see.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Lee Woofter

customer_reviews.title: Difference maker!!
customer_reviews.text: Showering in filtered water really does make a difference...you feel refreshed when getting out of the shower and even your hair gets softer! Anytime I come in contact with chlorinated water I can tell an immediate difference! It's well worth it and lasts me (bachelor) almost a full year!
customer_reviews.author: Dusty L.

customer_reviews.title: Very good shower water filter.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this type of water filter for over a year and I'm very pleased with it. For those like me that cannot afford a whole home water filtration system this is the best next thing, obviously the filter is kind of big and it looks know me of ugly but, when water quality and budget are in mind, hisbisbrhebwaybto go. It does what is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Antonio Zuniga

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to install - I am not mechanically inclined but ...
customer_reviews.text: This filter is a dream come true! I have struggled with hard water in an older home with some copper pipes turning my hair green for 20 years. This filter solved the problem virtually over night. It was very easy to install - I am not mechanically inclined but I managed to install in 5 minutes. The way I installed it, I did not need the shower head and the filter is working fine with a different one.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: No more chlorine!  Good pressure, adjustable head w/massage
customer_reviews.text: This product does seem to do everything claimed -- I don't have any more chlorine in my water. I was pleased that it was pretty easy to install (once I managed to get off the old showerhead, which wasn't easy!). The water pressure coming out of it is great too, it does not restrict water flow. Also, it has an adjustable head so you can have a regular stream or a massage -- I didn't even realize this when I ordered it. Bonus!
customer_reviews.author: ReadClosely

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I installed this product by myself and it was easy. I used for three times. I can tell the amount of hair on the ground is getting less. I am very happy about the product.
customer_reviews.author: xiaoying zhou

customer_reviews.title: A good filter
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using aquasana filters for years. Our water is very hard so it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J.

customer_reviews.title: ... my hair soooo soft and made my skin feel amazing, but it definitely decreases the water pressure
customer_reviews.text: Made my hair soooo soft and made my skin feel amazing, but it definitely decreases the water pressure. I am not exactly a handyman, so I was scared that this would be difficult to install, but it's very easy to do. And the filter lasts forever. I share my bathroom with two other people and we went almost a year before having to replace the filter
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: few weeks before purchasing this shower head I paid $19.99 for a cheaper one at a big box "Home" improvement store; bad mistake - my skin and scalp still itched from the hard water in Arizona. Almost immediately after installing this shower head, I felt a huge difference. It's a big filter, but does an amazing job! Super easy install and really works. Trust me, don't buy the other products if you have this as a possibility.
customer_reviews.author: elbandido

product_meta.title: Aquasana AQ-4100 Deluxe Shower Water Filter System with Adjustable Showerhead
product_meta.description: Enjoy showering in filtered water with a simple attachment to your existing shower line - no tools necessary. The unique two-stage up-flow filter design combines coconut shell carbon and a KDF copper/zinc oxidation process to remove harsh chemicals including chlorine, lead, pesticides, hydrogen sulfides, and other volatile organic compounds from your tap water. The coconut shell carbon also enhances the taste and smell of your water. The benefits let you enjoy healthy, clean water while you shower giving you softer, more moisturized skin and shinier, healthier hair. Aquasana's shower filter lasts for 10,000 gallons or 6 months of shower use before needing replacement. Shower in water that's better than bottled water for as little as $0.25 cents per day. This product includes a shower filter and a premium massaging shower head with multiple settings.
feature_bullets: Healthier Skin, Hair & Air - Reduced harmful chemicals means more moisturized skin, healthy shiny hair, and less chlorine in your shower steam.
Premium NSF Certified Filtration Media - Natural coconut shell carbon reduces chlorine, lead, iron and other harsh chemicals, while copper & zinc media enhances your water's PH balance.
Maximum Filtration & Water Pressure - Constructed with a unique up flow design which prevents clogging, increases contact time with media, and maintains water pressure.
Long Lasting & Cost Efficient Filtration - Our filters are some of the longest lasting on the market. Keep your water fresh for 6 months or 10, 000 Gallons and for as little as 25 cents a day.
Simple DIY Installation & Filter Replacement - Easily install showerhead in 4 simple steps. For optimal filtration, replace filters every 6 months.
